name: Kentucky Fried Christmas Story
description:
The Game:
You are Josiah, waking up from a bad experience in a strange world.
A stranger offers you some help..

Type:
3D Platformer

The purpose:
This game is made for the Secret Santa game jam and is my first upload/jam.
Had a lot of fun messing around with this game, the overal game is a bit silly.

Platforms:
Windows

Engine: 
Unreal Engine

Credits:
All the models/sounds/materials etc have been made by me.

Background info on giftee:
Likes multiple genres, I chose platforming.
Likes: Whales, Purple
Dislikes: Green, Cows
Works at: KFC
